coredata.dc:title: Construct of Web-based Instructional Environment Based on Inter-subjectivity Fusing Cognition with Emotion–Taking the Website Design of the Quality Course Apparel Production and Management for Example
coredata.prism:issueName: International Conference on Future Computer Supported Education, August 22- 23, 2012,Fraser Place Central - Seoul
coredata.dc:creator: Ji, Xiaofen
Zhang, Ying
Ren, Xinting
coredata.dc:description: AbstractFaced with deficient ability of autonomic learning among learners and low emotional involvement in current web-based instructional environment, here we propose a construct model that is based on inter-subjectivity fusing cognition with emotion to make up for these shortages. Further more, we’ve put the construct model into practice through the online teaching reformation of the quality course apparel production and management.
coredata.dcterms:subject: web-based instructional environment
inter-subjectivity
fusing cognition with emotion

H[FHOOHQW ZRUNV DQG UHODWLQJ PHGLD FRYHUDJH DUH VKDUHG LQ WK

head.ce:title: Construct of Web-based Instructional Environment Based on Inter-subjectivity Fusing Cognition with Emotion–Taking the Website Design of the Quality Course Apparel Production and Management for Example

ce:affiliation.ce:textfn: School of Fashion Design & Engineering, Zhejiang Sci-Tech University, Hangzhou (310018), China

ce:abstract-sec.ce:simple-para: Faced with deficient ability of autonomic learning among learners and low emotional involvement in current web-based instructional environment, here we propose a construct model that is based on inter-subjectivity fusing cognition with emotion to make up for these shortages. Further more, we’ve put the construct model into practice through the online teaching reformation of the quality course apparel production and management.

ce:other-ref.ce:textref: Ren Ruixian, Analysis of Emotional Communication in E-Learning Environment[J], Open Education Research, 2004(3), pp.47-50.
Jerry Losec, Zhu Xiaobin, Wang Jingli. Affective bracket: Students’ Emotional and Academic Intersection of Teachers’ Knowledge[J], Open Education Research, 2009(5).
Ross, A.R. (1996), The Influence of Computer Communication skills on Participation in A Computer Conferencing Course, Journal of Educational Computing Research, 15(1), pp.37-52.
Liu Jingfu, Zhong Zhixian. Lack of Sensation In On-Line Teaching And Countermeasure[J], Distance Education in China, 2001(6).
Hao Ning, Defects of online education from the perspective of educational psychology[J], E-education Research, 2002(11).
Feng Xiangdong, From the Perspective of Inter-subjectivity:the Key Element Relationof the Teaching Activities[J], Journal of Higher Education. 2004(5).
Pan Derong, Hermeneutics: From Inter and Outer- subjectivity to Inter-subjectivity[J], Journal of Anhui Normal University(Social Science Edition), 2002(3).
Feng Jianjun, Educational Process of Communication[J], Education Research, 2000(2).
Qiao Jianzhong, Theoretical Approach to the Teaching Mode of Fusing Cognition with Emotion[J], Journal of Nanjing Normal University(Social Science Edition), 2006(1).
